title: Australian Senate Panel Throws Support Behind Crypto Exchange Bill

body: Canada's central bank is embarking on the next phase of its ongoing "Project Jasper" distributed ledger research initiative. In addition to the Bank of Canada, Payments Canada – which operates the primary payment channels within the country – and exchange operator TMX are also taking part.

metaInfo.author: Stan Higgins
metaInfo.keywords: bank of canada, central bank, project jasper

title: Bank of Canada Announces Phase 3 of 'Project Jasper' DLT Trial
